text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Draw an oval for the head of the anime dog. Add a line through the center of the oval.
Draw guidelines for the body of the dog.
Add guidelines for legs and a tail. Outline the eyes and nose.
Draw the shapes of the feet and tail.
Outline the face, ears and eyes of the anime dog.
Add some lines to indicate the shape of the ears and eyes. Sketch a nose.
Work further on the shape, making the picture more detailed.
Contour, trying to vary the thickness and blackness of the line. Draw more details and some grass. Erase all guidelines.
